document.full_text: one new poll finds that most americans say the war in afghanistan is not worth fighting, while another shows that americans are likely to blame the nation's debt on the wars in afghanistan and iraq.
document.title: at war: public opinion on the wars? new polls offer conflicting evidence
lines_and_colors: one new poll finds that most americans say the war in afghanistan is not worth fighting, while another shows that americans are likely to blame the nation's debt on the wars in afghanistan and iraq.
